content.title: Intro
content.content: gwaith is a Sindarin word meaning "'people' associated by place and occupation". The forms -weith and waith are often used of "regions in proper names or peoples".[1]

content.title: Examples
content.content:
denoting people
Danwaith
Forodwaith = "People of the North"
Gaurwaith
Gwaith-i-Mírdain = "Brotherhood of Jewel-smiths"
Tawarwaith
denoting region or land
Drúwaith Iaur
Enedwaith
Forodwaith
Haradwaith
